info.name: Public REST APIs
info.description: This is a collection of different REST APIs that are completley public and do not require any authentication, making it easier for consumers to play with and understand what APIs are all about by seeing the many different ways in which APIs can be used.

item.name: Animals

request.description:
Facts about cats.

URL - https://alexwohlbruck.github.io/cat-facts/

List all dog breeds.

URL - https://dog.ceo/dog-api/documentation/
Returns facts on pet food using barcode.

item.description: These are public API endpoints for animals.

item.name: Anime
Studio Ghibli

request.description: The Films endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli films.
The People endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli people. This broadly includes all Ghibli characters, human and non.
The Locations endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli locations. This broadly includes lands, countries, and places.
The Species endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli species. This includes humans, animals, and spirits et al.
The Vehicles endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli vechiles. This includes cars, ships, and planes.

item.description:
The Studio Ghibli API catalogs the people, places, and things found in the worlds of Ghibli.

Website - https://ghibliapi.herokuapp.com/#
These are public API endpoints for anime.

item.name: APIs
APIs.guru

request.description: List all of the APIs in the directory.

item.description: Wikipedia for Web APIs. Repository of API specs in OpenAPI(fka Swagger) 2.0 format.
These are public API endpoints for APIs.

item.name: Barcodes

request.description: Searches for product details using barcode.

item.description: These are public API endpoints for barcodes.

item.name: Bikes

request.description: Bikewise is a place to learn about and report bike crashes, hazards, and thefts.

item.description: These are public API endpoints for bikes.

item.name: Books
Open Library

request.description: The API allows requesting information on one or more books using ISBNs, OCLC Numbers, LCCNs and OLIDs (Open Library IDs).
Our Covers API provides a programmatic method to access the book covers and author photos available in the Open Library Covers Repository.
Open Library provides an experimental API to search.

item.description:
Open Library is an initiative of the Internet Archive, a 501(c)(3) non-profit, building a digital library of Internet sites and other cultural artifacts in digital form. Other projects include the Wayback Machine, archive.org and archive-it.org.

Website - https://openlibrary.org/developers/api
These are public API endpoints for books.

item.name: Cars

request.description:
Returns a list of makes of cars.

Website - https://vpic.nhtsa.dot.gov/api/

Returns a list of car manufacturers.

Website - https://vpic.nhtsa.dot.gov/api/

item.description: These are public API endpoints for cars.

item.name: Church
Liturgical Calendar

request.description: Query the calendar for today.
Query the calendar for tomorrow.
Query the calendar for yesterday.

item.description: The API provides access to Roman Catholic liturgical calendar according to the norms set forth by the liturgical reform after the II Vatican Council. Several Sanctorale calendars are available and others can be added easily.

item.name: Hebcal

request.description: Providing Jewish calendar data.
Providing Shabbat Times

item.description: Our mission at Hebcal.com is to increase awareness of Jewish holidays and to help Jews to be observant of the mitzvot. You can embed Hebcal.com content directly onto your synagogue website with our JavaScript, JSON and RSS APIs.
These are public API endpoints for church.

item.name: Cities
item.description: These are public API endpoints for city data.

item.name: Comics

request.description: Returns the latest XKCD comic.

item.description: These are public API endpoints for comics.

item.name: Cryptocurrency
Coindesk

request.description: Returns the current Bitcoin price.

item.description: Website - https://www.coindesk.com/coindesk-api

item.name: Cryptonator

request.description: Returns actual volume-weighted price, total 24h volume and the price change.
Returns actual volume-weighted price, total 24h volume, rate change as well as prices and volumes across all connected exchanges.

item.description:
Cryptonator provides unique volume of cryptocurrency exchange rates data, which is delivered in easy-to-integrate JSON format via simple HTTPS requests. Prices are updated every 30 seconds, covering 300+ cryptocurrencies across 67 exchanges.

Website - https://www.cryptonator.com/api/
These are public API endpoints for cryptocurrency.

item.name: Domains
DomainsDB

request.description: Registered domains search checks the lists of registered domains for names containing particular words/phrases/numbers or symbols.

item.description: Registered domains search checks the lists of registered domains for names containing particular words/phrases/numbers or symbols. Technically it's just a GUI interface for domains-index.com database containing more than 260M of registered domains and 1000+ TLDS including newGTLDs. It's free to use and could be helpful domains/marketing research tool.
These are public API endpoints for domains.

item.name: Drones

request.description: Real-time and historical data about every reported covert United States drone strike.

item.name: News

request.description: Chronicling America provides access to information about historic newspapers and select digitized newspaper pages. To encourage a wide range of potential uses, we designed several different views of the data we provide, all of which are publicly visible. Each uses common Web protocols, and access is not restricted in any way. You do not need to apply for a special key to use them. Together they make up an extensive application programming interface (API) which you can use to explore all of our data in many ways.
